Key Match Events: Lionel Messi broke the all-time record for Copa América minutes played
Kevin Rodríguez's header brings Ecuador to a 1-1 tie with Argentina in stoppage time
Lionel Messi sets up Argentina's first goal with a masterful free kick
Alexis Mac Allister delivers for Argentina
Gonzalo Montiel sinks it for Argentina
Post-Match Reflections: Nicolas Otamendi seals it, Argentina moves on!
